headline: Is It Time To Reassess IBM (IBM) After Its Recent Share Price Softness?
summary: If you are wondering whether International Business Machines is fairly priced or offering value right now, you are not alone. This is especially the case with the stock in focus for long term tech exposure. IBM shares last closed at US$298.93, with returns of 2.5% year to date and 21.5% over the past year. Over the last 7 days and 30 days, the share price shows 2.5% and 1.7% declines, respectively. Recent attention on IBM has centered on its positioning as a large, established player in...
